705917f-a.text:
Nelson Street, at the southwest corner of Hicks Street, showing
Public School No. 27, erected in 1890.
Board of Education of the City of New York September 4, 1930
705917f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705918f-a.text:
(1)
Nelson Street, at the S. W. corner of Hicks Street, showing Public School No. 27. The view is from Hcks Street (right), at Huntington Street and shows the east side and rear of the school across an empty lot, where formerly stood several frame houses.
June 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date.
August 5, 1934
P. L. Sperr
705918f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705920f-b.text:
Nelson Street (right), at the S.W. corner of Hicks Street, showing Public School No. 27.
P. L. Sperr
View 1: June 25, 1931
View 2: August 5, 1934
705920f-b.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705920f-a.text:
Nelson Street (right), at the S.W. corner of Hicks Street, showing Public School No. 27.
P. L. Sperr
View 1: June 25, 1931
View 2: August 5, 1934
705920f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705919f-a.text:
Nelson Street, west from and across Hicks Street, showing a W.P.A. sewer project. On the left, at the N.W. corner of the two streets, is Public School No. 27.
September 29, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
705919f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
